presentationColumns.name: Agreement Leakage Lines
presentationColumns.description: This is a derived attribute with values as 'Yes' or 'No' and works only for 'Inventory Item' based purchase orders. This attribute is derived as follows, If the Invoice records conforms to Spend metric definition and Invoice Distribution has a Purchase Order reference and the Purchase Order Line doesn't has an agreement associated though a open Blanket agreement is available for the item in Purchase order then Yes else No.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - PRC - Purchase Order Details.Agreement Leakage Lines

presentationColumns.name: PO Matched
presentationColumns.description: This is a derived attribute with values as 'Yes' or 'No'. This attribute is derived as follows, If the Invoice Distribution has a Purchase Order reference then Yes else No.

presentationColumns.name: Negotiated
presentationColumns.description: This is a derived attribute with values as 'Yes' or 'No'. This attribute is derived as follows, If the Invoice Distribution has a Purchase Order reference and the corresponding Purchase Order Line has 'Negotiated' flag checked then Yes else No.

presentationColumns.name: Sourcing Based
presentationColumns.description: This is a derived attribute with values as 'Yes' or 'No'. This attribute is derived as follows, If the Invoice Distribution has a Purchase Order reference and Purchase Order Line is created from a sourcing event then Yes else No.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - PRC - Purchase Order Details.Sourcing Based

presentationColumns.name: Requisition Based
presentationColumns.description: This is a derived attribute with values as 'Yes' or 'No'. This attribute is derived as follows, If the Invoice Distribution has a Purchase Order reference and Purchase Order Line has a Requisition reference then Yes else No.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - PRC - Purchase Order Details.Requisition Based

presentationColumns.name: Source Agreement Document Style
presentationColumns.description: This attribute refers to Purchase Order line 'Source Agreement Document Style'.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - PRC - Agreement Document Style.Agreement Document Style

presentationColumns.name: Source Agreement Document Type
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - PRC - Agreement Document Type.Agreement Document Type
